channel.title: Information on Levi's D&D Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Information on Levi's D&D Wisdom

item.title: Players
item.description: For the 2021 Tyranny of Dragons we have 7 PCs, Miriam (beautiful temptress!), Ruby, Zia, Flame, Timothy (likely not every game), Isaiah, and Brighton! Brighton and Isaiah are new to the game! Miriam: Miriam is playing a Tiefling Wizard named Noel Frostine (Fros-tīne)! Noel Frostine Ruby: Ruby is playing a Half-Orc fighter named Arizira (Ari-Seera)! Arizira At the young age of 5 years old Arizara was taken from her orkish village in a battle between their clan and that of the humans.

item.title: Races
item.description: Dragonborn +2 Str, +1 Cha A Dragonborn Warlock As their name implies, dragonborn are of draconic descent and therefore have some side effects of that. These include a breath weapon as well as damage resistance determined by the bloodline from which they’ve come. A dragonborn would make an excellent Fighter, Sorceror of a draconic bloodline, or perhaps an even better Cleric of the Tempest or War domain!
